inclusion.criterion: pregnant women with gestational age between 14-24 weeks and having singletone or multiple viable fetus
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all patients will be followed up every 4 weeks by taking history, any complaint of new symptoms, compliance to treatment, obstetric exam and investigation if indicated till delivery and record the time of delivery or termination of pregnancy.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Family history will be obtained to determine any history of family preterm birth.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 25-year-old pregnant woman with gestational age between 14-24 weeks. She has no history of cervical cercalage and her family history does not indicate a high risk of preterm birth.
